model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I can't believe how honored I am to be part of our class. I feel like we have something special going on here.
 You're right. Our class definitely has a unique energy about it. What do you think sets us apart from other classes?
 I think it's our sense of community. We all support each other and work together to achieve our goals.
 That's definitely a big factor. And I also think our class has a lot of diversity, which brings new perspectives and ideas to the table.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Planning a mall trip', 'Related Summaries': 'Classmates A and B discuss going to the mall for shopping and food.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Classmates A: Hey, have you ever been to the mall near our school? ### Classmates B: Yeah, I have. What about it? ### Classmates A: I wanted to go there this weekend. I love looking at clothes and trying them on. Also, the food court there has amazing options. ### Classmates B: Oh, I see. Yeah, I might join you. I also like people watching there. It can be quite entertaining. ### Classmates A: That's great! When do you think you'll be free to go? ### Classmates B: I'll check my schedule and let you know. But speaking of the mall, do you remember the time we went there last year and saw that famous celebrity? ### Classmates A: Oh yeah! I was so starstruck. I couldn't believe my eyes. ### Classmates B: That was such a memorable experience. Who would have thought that we would meet a celebrity at our local mall? ### Classmates A: I know, right? It just goes to show that you never know what could happen when you're out and about. ### Classmates B: Absolutely. Anyways, I'll let you know about this weekend. I'm looking forward to a fun day at the mall. ### Classmates A: , I've been meaning to tell you something for a while now... ### Classmates B: Sure, what's up? ### Classmates A: I think I'm in love with you. ### Classmates B: ### Oh, really? I had no idea. ### Classmates A: Yeah, it's been difficult trying to hide my feelings for you. Every time I see you, I can't help but smile. ### Classmates B: ### That's really sweet of you,. But I'm sorry, I don't feel the same way. ### Classmates A: ### Oh, I see. Well, I guess it's good that I finally told you how I feel. ### Classmates B: ### I hope we can still be friends though. You mean a lot to me. ### Classmates A: ### Of course, I value our friendship too much to let something like this ruin it. ### Classmates B: ### That's a relief. Do you want to do something fun to cheer you up? ### Classmates A: ### Actually, do you want to go to the mall? I could really use some retail therapy right now. ### Classmates B: ### I thought you'd never ask. Let's go try on some clothes and people watch like the good old days.' }(2) {'Related Topics': 'Excitement for a wedding reception', 'Related Summaries': 'Classmates A and B talk about dancing at a wedding reception.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Classmates A: Hey, Classmates B! I'm really looking forward to coming over. It feels like ages since we last caught up. ### Classmates B: I know, right? It's been way too long. I'm excited to hear about everything that's been going on in your life. ### Classmates A: Well, I recently started a new job, and it's been great so far. I'm learning a lot and meeting some cool people. ### Classmates B: That sounds amazing! Congratulations! What kind of work are you doing? ### Classmates A: I'm working in marketing for a fashion company. It's right up my alley because it combines my love for fashion and marketing. ### Classmates B: That's really cool! Speaking of fashion, do you remember when you told me how much you loved going to the mall to try on clothes and people watch? ### Classmates A: Of course I do! I still enjoy doing that, but lately, I've been more interested in online shopping. It's just so convenient. ### Classmates B: Ah, I see. Well, regardless, we should definitely plan a mall trip soon. I would love to go with you and browse some stores. ### Classmates A: That sounds like a great idea! And maybe after we can grab something to eat at the food court like we used to. ### Classmates B: Yes! I miss those days. And speaking of love, remember when you told me about your crush on me a while back? ### Classmates A: ### I do remember that, but honestly, it's not really a crush anymore. ### Classmates B: Oh really? Tell me more! ### Classmates A: Well, it's more like...I'm in love with you. I can't stop thinking about you and how amazing you make me feel. ### Classmates B: ### Wow. I don't know what to say. I never thought of you in that way. ### Classmates A: I know it's probably a shock, but I just had to be honest with you about how I feel. ### Classmates B: I appreciate your honesty, but I don't feel the same way. I hope we can still be friends and hang out like old times.' }
```
